name: Destiny Reviews
author: Artur Burkalo

sections.description:
The plugin will help to build better brand awareness and will let to share success stories with your users (aka humans).

Use [destiny_reviews] where you want to show reviews on your website.

Use [destiny_reviews_user_form] where you want users to submit their form.

If you do spot any bugs please email artur@destiny.ie and I’ll try to fix it.

You can choose between three styles: dark, light and custom dark is default, you can also change the border radius.

The plugin is lightweight, and only loads CSS where the shortcode is preseneted.

Tested with
– Oxygen Builder
– Custom Themes
– Gutenberg Editor
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload destiny-reviews.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Add where you want to show your reviews with a shortcode [destiny_reviews]
  4. Add where you want to show review submissions form with a shortcode [destiny_reviews_user_form]
sections.faq:
Will there be more features added to the Destiny Reviews Plugin?

We are always working adding new features to the plugin.

  • A new beggining for Destiny Review plugin

  • Fixed mobile responsiveness
  • Fixed bug with registering style settings

  • Added new style theme ‘Custom’ to choose own background colour and text colour
  • Added a review submission form, now users can submit reviews on the front end, form can be added with the shortcode [destiny_reviews_user_form]
  • Added review form custom settings, easy for translations
  • Added email notification for when the form is submitted
